Â· Updated iPA to YouTube_v19.45.4
Â· add sponsor Block (overlay controllers)
Â· Added 4K support for IPA versions, enabling streaming and downloading in up to 2160p.
Â· Added the ability to swipe down anywhere on the video/audio player to minimize to the mini player.
Â· Added swipe down gesture to close the mini player.
Â· Fixed an issue where backups could fail in specific cases if any YTKPlus folder is empty.
Â· Fixed an issue affecting MP3 audio and thumbnail handling during import to YTKPlus in some cases.
Â· Improved code structure for a smoother and more responsive user experience.
Â· Additional fixes and overall enhancements.
Â· Updated iPA to YouTube_v19.44.4
Â· add update availability checker
Â· Reverted mini player to the old style, activated by default. If you prefer the floating mini player, you can re-enable it in the overlay controls section.
Â· Fixed issues with playing in external player apps.
Â· Added HD icons for the overlay and other parts where icons are used.
Â· Fixed an issue in the custom mini player within the download manager where audio wouldn't stop when switching to video playback.
Â· Resolved mini player layout issues for RTL languages.
Â· Added audio interruption handling for both audio and video players.
Â· Implemented various enhancements and improvements for a smoother overall experience.
Â· Updated iPA to YouTube_v19.42.1
Â· Introduced an entirely new video player.
Â· Added a mini player for both video and audio in the download manager.
Â· add handle to import mp3 files to YTKPlus library.

Â· Support for M4A and MP3 downloads added.

Â· Fixed AirPlay icon permission issue.
Â· Improved audio and video player layout constraints.
Â· Enhanced download manager performance.
Â· Fixed PNG artwork import issues in some cases.
Â· Faster backup loading and improved backup compression (20% smaller).
Â· Fixed icon layout for Shorts downloads and fullscreen mode.
Â· Improved layout constraints for smaller devices.
Â· Reduced delay time when long-pressing downloaded items.
Â· Enhanced download manager to handle more items smoothly.
Â· Updated and fixed missing localizations.
Â· Improved speed and playback controllers for overlay, with save status handling.
Â· Other fixes and improvements.
Â· For purchase guidelines and FAQs, visit: https://ikghd.site/faq.html
